meta.article_title: December 11, 2017 - Push-Button Matches - Playing the Scary All-Out Attacker

causes_communes: Opponent attacks everything, no matter what you do

debutant: Attack first and look for every chance to attack
Keep the ball deep to make it harder to attack
Vary the spin to throw off the opponent's timing
Push effectively with long pushes that go pretty long

exercices_complementaires.description: Attack first, especially on your serve, and force the opponent to go for a wild counter-attack.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Long pushes with last-second changes of direction
exercices_complementaires.description: Make long pushes that go pretty long, with last-second changes of direction, and be low, heavy (or varied), and somewhat quick.

metriques_progression.description: Get in a quick short and force the opponent to make mistakes.
Go to the wide corners or elbow, depending on the opponent's strengths and weaknesses.

erreurs_a_eviter: Panic if the opponent makes a few great shots
